Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for taking the time to speak with me earlier today.
As we discussed, going forward, I will be your Customer Success Consultant. Should you have any questions during your trial period, please do not hesitate to reach out to me at {!User.Phone}. As always, the support is absolutely free.
Further to our conversation regarding your need for an integrated accounting and invoicing solution, I’ve summarized our discussion and next steps below. Please let me know if there is anything I’ve missed.
[ENTER HIGHLIGHTS AS BULLET POINTS, INCLUDING # USERS]
For these above reasons, I recommend you [RECAP WHICH PRODUCTS YOU RECOMMEND].
If you have not already done so, please be sure to enter in your credit card information in the product before your trial expires, to ensure there isn’t any disruption in your service and you can access your account to continue to run your business.
Again, if questions come up along the way, I’m here to help with whatever you need to make QuickBooks work for you.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Phone}
